short_summary: Purchase of XRF and LIBS analyzers
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services will be acquiring a set of XRF and LIBS analyzers under the auspices of the Canadian government. The acquisition will take place in Quebec, Qu??bec, Canada.
full_summary:
[**Tender Announcement for Portable XRF and LIBS Analyzers**](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14895130)

**Title:** 23331-230493 Portable XRF and LIBS Analyzers Combo
[Nota Bene!] Excessive grammar correction has been avoided.

English version
======================================

### General Information

The following is an announcement of an advance contract award notice (ACAN) by Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of Natural Resources Canada:

* **Reference Number:** WS3763113797-Doc3763149614
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3763113797
* **Publication Date:** 2022-12-14
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** January 6th, 2023 @ 14:00 HNE (EST)
* **Contract Award Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

### Tender Description

The contract is for the purchase of a combination of portable XRF (X-Ray Fluorescence) and LIBS (Laser-Induced Breakdown Spectroscopy) analyzers. This is a requirement for Natural Resources Canada. Deliveries will be made to the client in Quebec, Canada.

### Requirements

All bidding procedures are outlined in the Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) documentation, which can be downloaded from the contract notice URL above. The relevant documents, along with instructions for submission, are all part of the notice package.

### Tendering Procedure

Any bids submitted after 14:00 HNE (EST) on January 6th, 2023, will be refused, so all necessary documentation must be submitted by the aforementioned deadline.

### Information for Sourcing Information
